title: Kisi
summary: Secure & seamless access: Kisi turns keycards into smartphone based digital keys
description: The Kisi App turns your smartphone into an encrypted mobile key. Unlock your doors with the swipe of a finger or use Kisi‘s NFC based „Tap to Unlock“ technology. Learn how to get your own Kisi door devices via www.getkisi.com.Functionality:- Your company Badge in your phone- See and manage mobile or card based access rights- „Tap to Unlock“ technology for faster, more secure access- Remote unlock of door for administrators- Set up and configure new Kisi gear
descriptionHTML:
The Kisi App turns your smartphone into an encrypted mobile key. Unlock your doors with the swipe of a finger or use Kisi‘s NFC based „Tap to Unlock“ technology. Learn how to get your own Kisi door devices via www.getkisi.com.

Functionality:
- Your company Badge in your phone
- See and manage mobile or card based access rights
- „Tap to Unlock“ technology for faster, more secure access
- Remote unlock of door for administrators
- Set up and configure new Kisi gear
comments: It does not work on Android. And because of this I am late to work. It's very inconvienent. I would like it more if it was compatible with Android as it is with IOS. Give me an old-fashioned key.
Preformance has increased dramatically with Android phone. Still doesn't seem quite as good as Apple's but close
People say it doesn't work for android, I've never had an issue.
Got "unexpected error" where all of sudden I couldn't log in...meaning I couldn't get into my office!  Uninstalled and reinstalled and that fixed it so if getting that error try that
Running into same "unexpected error" on Android app.  iOS app is working it seems as well as web dashboard.
Newest version now prompts me every time I open it to turn on NFC, despite having no way to use it to unlock a door. Obnoxious.
